attributes.action: Limit the rent to the of maximum £400 and reduce house prices.
attributes.additional_details: By restricting rent to the maximum to £400 and house prices to buy, it will have a certain impact in the UK economy and improve everyone's lifestyle dramatically. By doing this you'll see a sharp decrease of loans being taken out just for essential needs to survive, also the number of homeless people will also decrease as the rent prices drop to a reasonable price. Answer me this, can you afford to see people suffer and homeless? They will turn to crime in order to survive
attributes.background: Set a limit for maximum rent to pay to £400, which restricts housing companies charging ridiculous prices just to live in 1 house. Also by reducing house prices to buy to about £20,000 for example

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for. Decisions about house prices are a matter for individual sellers, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Introduce a regulator for private landlords and caps for rent: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589028

Create a rent cap of £700 PCM and give extra protections to renters: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576340

Create a rent cap of £250 PCM per bedroom: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585466
